sectiondef.header: Constructors, destructors, and other standard methods

description.para: Reset method resets all attribute classes

briefdescription.para: Method call for copying child classes.

detaileddescription.para: The method has to be overridden.

briefdescription.para: Base method for checking if a child can be added.

detaileddescription.para: The method has to be overridden.

briefdescription.para: Get the current clef for the test element.

detaileddescription.para: Goes back on the layer until a clef is found. This is used when inserting a note by passing a y position because we need to know the clef in order to get the pitch.

briefdescription.para: Get the current clef based on facsimile for the test element.

detaileddescription.para: This goes back by facsimile position until a clef is found. Returns NULL if a clef cannot be found via this method.

sectiondef.header: Set and get the stem direction of the layer.

description.para: This stays STEMDIRECTION_NONE with on single layer in the staff.

sectiondef.header: Get the layers used for the duration of an element.

description.para: Takes into account cross-staff situations: cross staff layers have negative N.

sectiondef.header: Get the layers used within a time span.

description.para: Takes into account cross-staff situations: cross staff layers have negative N.

memberdef.argsstring: (double time, double duration, const Measure *measure, int staff) const
memberdef.name: GetLayersNInTimeSpan

memberdef.argsstring: (double time, double duration, const Measure *measure, int staff) const
memberdef.name: GetLayerCountInTimeSpan

briefdescription.para: Get the list of the layer elements for the duration of an element Takes into account cross-staff situations.

detaileddescription.para: If excludeCurrent is specified, gets the list of layer elements for all layers except current

memberdef.argsstring: (double time, double duration, const Measure *measure, int staff, bool excludeCurrent)
memberdef.name: GetLayerElementsInTimeSpan

briefdescription.para: Get the list of the layer elements used within a time span.

memberdef.argsstring: (double time, double duration, const Measure *measure, int staff, bool excludeCurrent) const
memberdef.name: GetLayerElementsInTimeSpan

briefdescription.para: Get the current clef, keysig, mensur and meterSig.
Set drawing clef, keysig, mensur, metersig, metersiggrp if necessary and if available.
Set drawing caution clef, keysig, mensur, metersig if necessary and if available.

sectiondef.header: Setter and getter for the cross-staff flags

briefdescription.para: Interface for class functor visitation.
See Object::InitOnsetOffset.
Export the object to a MidiFile.
The drawing stem direction of the layer based on the number of layers in the staff.
Two flags indicating when a layer is also used from cross-staff content from below or above.
Overriding CloneReset() method to be called after copy / assignment calls.
Return the index position of the layer in its staff parent.
Return the clef offset for the position x.

detaileddescription.para: The method uses Layer::GetClef first to find the clef before test.

briefdescription.para: Return the clef offset for the position if there are cross-staff clefs on the same layer.
See Object::ConvertMarkupArtic.
See Object::ConvertToCastOffMensural.
See Object::ConvertToUnCastOffMensural.
See Object::InitProcessingLists.
See Object::GenerateMIDIEnd.
This class represents a layer in a laid-out score (Doc).

detaileddescription.para: A Layer is contained in a Staff. It contains LayerElement objects.
